title: How to change attack move button?
body: As you should all know shift+right click makes you attack move, having the tiny baby hands I do reaching the shift button is annoying for me so I went to change it to t+right click but as soon as I go to enter either t or right click it selects that as the button before I can enter the other plus it won't work on just right click or just t.

replies.body:
I was told by someone that you needed to do the following:
Go to LoL properties, open file location, logs, and then delete "Maestro Logs" I am confident this will alleviate your problem in regards to modifying the attack move button.
Best of wishes, Justify.
you have to into the game files, there's a reddit post on it.
